_meta.source: Researched from Visit Seattle, cruise terminal guides, and tourism resources

bbox_hint.note: Covers cruise terminals, downtown Seattle, Pike Place, and Seattle Center

transit_routes.name: Walk/Transit Downtown
transit_routes.note: Pier 66 walkable to Pike Place. Pier 91 needs shuttle/taxi to downtown.

transit_routes.name: Seattle Monorail
transit_routes.note: Quick connection between Westlake (downtown) and Seattle Center. Fun and efficient.

featured_experiences.name: Pike Place Market
featured_experiences.note: Seattle's iconic 1907 public market. Arrive early for best experience. Don't miss the gum wall!

featured_experiences.name: Space Needle & Seattle Center
featured_experiences.note: Buy Space Needle tickets in advance. Combine with MoPOP (music/pop culture) and Chihuly glass.

featured_experiences.name: Pioneer Square & Underground
featured_experiences.note: Seattle's original downtown. Underground Tour reveals buried city streets. Great restaurants.
